TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MetadataRootBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 要嵌入到可移植可执行映像中的元数据根的生成器。

span.span: Builder of a Metadata Root to be embedded in a Portable Executable image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元数据根构成元数据标头，后跟元数据流 (`#~` 、 `#Strings` 、 `#US` `#Guid` 和 `#Blob`) 。Metadata root constitutes of a metadata header followed by metadata streams (`#~`, `#Strings`, `#US`, `#Guid` and `#Blob`).

param.span: 用存储在表中的元数据实体和存储在堆中的值填充的生成器。

span.span: Builder populated with metadata entities stored in tables and values stored in heaps.

param.span: 序列化元数据根时，会枚举实体和值。

span.span: The entities and values will be enumerated when serializing the metadata root.

param.name: metadataVersion
param.span: 写入元数据头的版本字符串。

span.span: The version string written to the metadata header.
The default value is "v4.0.30319".

param.name: suppressValidation
param.span: 表示在序列化过程中取消元数据表的基本验证；否则为 。

span.span: to suppress basic validation of metadata tables during serialization; otherwise, .

summary.span: 创建元数据根的生成器。

span.span: Creates a builder of a metadata root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `suppressValidation` 设置为时 `true` ，验证将验证表中的条目是否按照 ECMA 规范要求的顺序添加。When `suppressValidation` is set to `true`, the validation verifies that entries in the tables were added in order required by the ECMA specification. 它不强制对元数据表执行所有规范要求。It does not enforce all specification requirements on metadata tables.
